vue插件编写等

vuePress-theme-reco 红尘散仙    2022

vue插件编写等

红尘散仙 2022-04-30 Vuepinia

介绍

vue3.2插件编写，扩展类型，pinia插件

# vue3

# tsx

1.先下载插件

npm install @vitejs/plugin-vue-jsx

2.配置vite.config.ts

记得先导入包

3.配置ts.config.json

加入以下三条数据

4.使用

import {ref }from 'vue'

let v=ref<string>("")

const renderDom=()=>{
  return (
    <div>
      <input type="text" v-model={v.value}/>
      <div>{v.value}</div>
    </div>
  )
}

export default renderDom

import {ref }from 'vue'


let flag=ref(true)
const renderDom=()=>{
  return (
    <div>
      {flag.value ? <div>今天</div> : <div>明天</div>}
    </div>
  )
}

export default renderDom

import {ref }from 'vue'

let flag=ref(true)
let arr=[1,2,3,4,5,6,7]
const renderDom=()=>{
  return (
    <div>
      {
        arr.map((v)=>{
          return <h2>{v}</h2>
        })
      }
    </div>
  )
}

export default renderDom

import {ref }from 'vue'


let flag=ref(true)
let arr=[1,2,3,4,5,6,7]
const clickMsg=(v:number)=>{
  console.log('我是',v)
}

const renderDom=()=>{
  return (
    <div>
      {
        arr.map((v)=>{
          return <h2 onClick={clickMsg.bind(this,v)}>{v}</h2>
        })
      }
    </div>
  )
}

export default renderDom

注意：

使用tsx时，=后面接花括号即{}，任何用到变量的地方都要用{}

不支持v-if，需要转换编程思想

不支持v-for，需要转换编程思想

不支持v-bind,v-on,使用事件需要.bind(this,参数)

# v-model

默认情况下，组件上的 v-model 使用 modelValue 作为 prop 和 update:modelValue 作为事件。我们可以通过向 v-model 传递参数来修改这些名称：

//子组件
<template>
  <div v-if="modelValue">
    <div>主题
    <button @click="change">关闭</button>
    </div>
    <div>
      内容{{modelValue}}
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
defineProps<{
  modelValue:any
}>()

const emit=defineEmits<{
  (e:'update:modelValue',flag:boolean):void
}>()
const change=()=>{
  emit('update:modelValue',false)
}

</script>

<style scoped lang="less">
div {
  border:1px solid black;
  background-color: rgb(160, 46, 31);
  div:first-child {
    height: 30px;
    width: 300px;
    text-align: center;
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
  }
  div:last-child {
    height: 300px;
    width: 300px;
  }
}
</style>

//父组件

<template>
  <div>
    <button @click="flag=!flag">btn {{flag}} </button>
    <div class="box">
      <Dialog v-model="flag"></Dialog>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import Dialog from './dialog.vue'
import { ref } from 'vue'
let flag=ref<boolean>(true)


</script>

<style scoped lang="less">

.box {
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
 
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  background-color: aqua;
}
</style>

# 自定义修饰符

<template>
  <div v-if="modelValue" v-move>
    <div class="div">
      <div>{{title}}
      <button @click="change">关闭</button>
      </div>
      <div>
        内容{{modelValue}}
        修饰符{{modelModifiers?.test}}
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { Directive ,DirectiveBinding,useAttrs} from 'vue';

let attr=useAttrs()
console.log(attr)
const propsData=defineProps<{
  modelValue:any,
  modelModifiers?:{
    test:boolean
  },
  title:string,
  titleModifiers?:{
    test:boolean
  }
}>()

const emit=defineEmits<{
  (e:'update:modelValue',flag:boolean):void;
  (e:'update:title',data:string):void
}>()
const change=()=>{
  emit('update:modelValue',false)
}
if(propsData.titleModifiers){
  emit('update:title',"我是子组件的传过来的标题")
}


//自定义拖拽指令
const vMove:Directive={
  mounted(el:HTMLElement,dir:DirectiveBinding){
    let moveElement:HTMLDivElement=el.firstChild as HTMLDivElement
    /* console.log(moveElement) */
    const mouseDone=(e:MouseEvent)=>{
      let x=e.clientX -el.offsetLeft
      let y=e.clientY-el.offsetTop
      const move=(e:MouseEvent)=>{
        console.log(e)
        el.style.left=e.clientX -x+'px';
        el.style.top=e.clientY -y+'px';
      }
      document.addEventListener('mousemove',move)
      document.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>{
        document.removeEventListener('mousemove',move)
      })
    }
    moveElement.addEventListener('mousedown',mouseDone)
  }
}

</script>

<style scoped lang="less">
div {
  position: relative;
}
.div {
  border:1px solid black;
  background-color: rgb(160, 46, 31);
  
  div:first-child {
    height: 30px;
    width: 300px;
    text-align: center;
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
  }
  div:last-child {
    height: 300px;
    width: 300px;
  }
}
</style>

<template>
  <div>
    <button @click="flag=!flag">btn {{flag}} </button>
    <div class="box" >
      <Dialog a="123" v-model.test="flag" v-model:title.test="titledate"></Dialog>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import Dialog from './dialog.vue'
import { ref ,Directive, DirectiveBinding} from 'vue'
let flag=ref<boolean>(true)
let titledate=ref<string>('父主题')

// 自定义指令
const vMove:Directive={
  created(el:Element){
    console.log('======>created')
  },
  mounted(el:HTMLElement,dir:DirectiveBinding<{background:string}>) {
    el.style.background=dir.value.background
  },
}



</script>

<style scoped lang="less">

.box {
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
 
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  background-color: aqua;
  
}
</style>

# EventBus类型声明

//声明类型
declare module '@vue/runtime-core' {
  export interface ComponentCustomProperties {
    $Bus:typeof mit,
    $filters:{
      format:<T>(str:T)=>string
    }
  }
}

# 自定义插件

# 1.定义组件

position:fixed;insert:0;能产生奇效

<template>
  <div class="loading" v-if="isShow">
    <div>
      <p>......loading</p>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import {ref ,Ref} from 'vue'
let isShow=ref<boolean>(false)
const show=()=>{
  isShow.value=true
}
const unShow=()=>{
  isShow.value=false
}

defineExpose<{
  isShow:Ref<boolean>
  show:()=>void,
  unShow:()=>void
}>({
  isShow,
  show,
  unShow
})
</script>

<style scoped lang="less">

.loading{
  position: fixed;
  inset: 0;
  background-color: #ccc;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  opacity: 0.5;
  div {
    font-size: 35px;
    color: aqua;
  }
}

</style>

# 2.定义插件

import {App ,createVNode,VNode,render ,ComponentCustomProperties} from 'vue'
import Loading from './loading.vue'

//声明文件
declare module '@vue/runtime-core' {
  export interface ComponentCustomProperties {
    $loading:{
      show():void,
      unShow():void
    }
  }
}

export default {
  //这是插件默认加载函数
  install(app:App){
    //1.把组件转换为虚拟dom
    const vnode:VNode=createVNode(Loading)
    //2.转真实dom需要用render函数
    render(vnode,document.body)
    //3.把组件的方法挂载到全局
     /**
      * console.log(vnode.component?.exposed)
      * 在组件通过defineExpose把方法暴露出来
      */
     //挂载到全局
     app.config.globalProperties.$loading={
       show:vnode.component?.exposed?.show,
       unShow:vnode.component?.exposed?.unShow
     }
  }
}

# 3.使用

<template>
  <div class="loading"></div>
  <router-link to="/random">random</router-link> |
  <router-link to="/state">state</router-link>|
  <router-link to="/dialog">dialog</router-link>
  <router-view></router-view>
  <!-- <Father></Father>
  <h1>{{data}}</h1>
  <RenderDom title='我是tsx' @on-click="getnum" ></RenderDom> -->
  <img src="./assets/2053570.jpg" alt="">
  <p>{{$filters.format('互联网世界')}}</p>
  <button @click="showloading"> show loading</button>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import RenderDom from './components/mytsx'
import Father from './components/Father.vue'
import { provide,ref ,getCurrentInstance} from 'vue';
import useBase64 from './hooks/hook'

provide("flag",ref(false))
let data=ref<number>(0)
const getnum=(v:number)=>{
  console.log("--------",v)
  data.value=v
}

/* useBase64({
  el:'img'
}).then((date)=>{
  console.log(date.baseUrl)
}) */
//调用插件
const instance=getCurrentInstance()
const showloading=()=>{
  //插件一般在appContext里
  instance?.appContext.config.globalProperties.$loading.show()

  setTimeout(()=>{
    instance?.appContext.config.globalProperties.$loading.unShow()
  },5000)
}

</script>

<style>
*{
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
img {
  width: 700px;
}
</style>

# pinia

# 1.安装

npm install pinia

# 2.使用非常简单

可以参考官方文档

# 3.编写pinia插件做本地持久化

import {PiniaPluginContext} from 'pinia'
import {toRaw} from 'vue'
/**
 * @function setStorage
 * @param key 传入键名
 * @param value 任意值
 * @returns 没有返回值
 */
const setStorage=(key:string,value:any)=>{
  localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(value))
}
/**
 * 
 * @param key 键名
 * @returns 返回缓存的对象
 */
const getStorage=(key:string):object=>{
  return localStorage.getItem(key) ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(key) as string) : {}
}
export const piniaPlugin=(options:{key:string})=>{

  return (context:PiniaPluginContext)=>{
    //结构store
    const {store} =context
    
    //首次刷新读取缓存
    const data=getStorage(`${options?.key ?? 'yeshifu'}-${store.$id}`)
    /* console.log(data); */
    
    //每次修改都触发保存
    store.$subscribe(()=>{
      /* console.log(`${options?.key ?? 'yeshifu'}-${store.$id}`,toRaw(store.$state)) */
      setStorage(`${options?.key ?? 'yeshifu'}-${store.$id}`,toRaw(store.$state))
    })

    //直接返回值相当于修改store的状态
    return {
      ...data
    }
  }

}

//导入pinia模块
import {createPinia} from 'pinia'
const store=createPinia()
//导入pinia插件 
import {piniaPlugin} from './store/pinia_plugin'
store.use(piniaPlugin({
  key:'pinia'
}))
